entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 06:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
